proposal: Diving into the world of $PEPI, it's clear you're not just another token; you're a movement for inclusivity, aiming to leap beyond the lily pads of the crypto pond. With 18 holders in the ETH network, you're already gathering a vibrant community. Imagine enhancing this ecosystem with your own DEX or engaging the community further with a blockchain-based lottery. Let's hop together towards empowering more voices in the crypto space.
